divs: sighting detailsaround 9am my friend seen a light in the sky. after examining it for a couple seconds he seen 2 beams of light come out from the object going down diagnally but not touching the ground, he tells me what he saw. i look up and realize its the same thing i seen the other night on 4\18\08 this time we counted 6 crafts. they would hover from side to side. up and down and get closer and further away. at one point an airplane passed by one of these objects and when the airplane got close, the object got dimmer as if to hide its presence, when the airplane got further, the ufo would get brighter. the same plane incountered another object that was directly in the planes flight path, when the plane got close the object moved quickly out of its line of flight to avoid collision, when the plane passes the ufo went back to the spot it was hovering at, just minutes after that, 3 more planes come from out of the distance and fly around as if they are checking the area, i went inside to take a break for a while and come back out 30 minutes later, ufos are still there, but in different locations of course. the objects were out from 9pm till 5:45am on 4\22\08 on 2 occasions when i was watching these things, i seen 2 "shooting stars" right by the ufos, i dont know if this has to do with any of this but i didnt see any kind of ufos in my life untill the earthquake on 4\18\08 this is the second time i have experienced the same thing in 3 days, and i know more people than just me and the airplane pilots seen these things,so please if anyone reports anything like this in the near future or in the past month or so, please contant me at vo0rheez@yahoo.com thank you very much
